author: Fox News
title: Russian vodka pulled from shelves in US, Canada bars, liquor stores: ‘Every small thing makes a difference’
description: Liquor stores across the U.S. and Canada have started throwing out their stocks of Russian vodka in protest of President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine, according to reports.
content:
Liquor stores across the U.S. and Canada have started throwing out their stocks of Russian vodka in protest of President Vladimir Putins invasion of Ukraine, according to reports.
